refnamediv.refpurpose: a class that uses the SMT solver CVC Lite to solve formulas in conjunctive normal form

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The class &class_smt_solver_cvc_lite; inherits from the class &class_smt_lib_solver;. It uses the SMT solver CVC Lite (&solver_cvc_lite-url;) to determine the satisfiability of propositional formulas. To use the solver CVC Lite, the directory containing the corresponding executable must be in the path.
The constructor &smt_solver_cvc_lite_constructor; checks if CVC Lite's executable is indeed available and reports an error if it is not.
The method &smt_solver_cvc_lite_is_satisfiable; receives a formula in conjunctive normal form as parameter &par_formula; and indicates whether or not this formula is satisfiable.

refsect1.title: Preconditions
refsect1.para:
The following precondition has to be satisfied for &smt_solver_cvc_lite_is_satisfiable;:
The argument passed as parameter &par_formula; is a list of expressions of sort &sort_bool; in internal mCRL2 format. The argument represents a formula in conjunctive normal form, where the elements of the list represent the clauses
